    K = {2^32 × abs(sin(i))}, where i is the ith prime number. 

    Message Schedule:
    W[0..15] = ASCII codes of the first 16 characters of the string
    For i = 16 to 63:
        W[i] = (sigma1(W[i-2]) + W[i-7] + sigma0(W[i-15]) + W[i-16]) mod 2^32

    where sigma0(x) = (x rightrotate 7) xor (x rightrotate 18) xor (x rightshift 3)
    and sigma1(x) = (x rightrotate 17) xor (x rightrotate 19) xor (x rightshift 10)
